titleStmt.title: The young-man's duty: or, Good council for young-men. Shewing the happiness of being good betimes. [W]ith an alarm from the eternal God, to drowsie saints and secure sinners. As also the young-mans objections an[s]wered, and the old-mans doubts resolved. / By Roger Hough.
titleStmt.author: Hough, Roger

publicationStmt.publisher: [Pri]nted by W.L. and T.J. for Phillip Brooksby ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tight binding with some loss of text.
